real_rate.reason: 5 attempts exhausted (MLP, GRU, Transformer, PCA, StateFeatures). Gate 2 consistently passes (MI +10-39%) but Gate 3 consistently fails. Root cause: monthly macro regime information cannot improve daily gold return prediction when base features already contain the direct real rate level. Base real_rate feature retained.

dxy.reason: Auto-evaluated as success (MI=0.019). Full Gate 2/3 evaluation was not performed in detail.

technical.reason: Gate 3 PASS via MAE criterion (-0.1824, 18x threshold). MAE improved in 5/5 folds. HMM regime detection + z-score + GK volatility captures genuine structural information about gold price dynamics.

cross_asset.reason: Gate 3 PASS via DA (+0.76%, 3/5 folds) and MAE (-0.0866, 8.7x threshold, 4/5 folds). Deterministic HMM with 3-state regime detection on cross-asset correlations. regime_prob rank 7/28 and divergence rank 10/28 in feature importance. Gate 2 stability marginally fails (0.156 vs 0.15) for regime_prob only - consistent with VIX/Technical precedent for regime features.
